mapper.select: SELECT id,code,path,method,is_public_access,is_login_access,is_within AS within,resource_level FROM iam_permission WHERE service_code = #{service} AND method = #{method}

SELECT imr.source_id FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER JOIN iam_role_permission irp ON irp.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.source_type = #{sourceType} AND imr.member_id = #{memberId} AND imr.member_type = #{memberType} AND irp.permission_id = #{permissionId}
SELECT is_enabled FROM fd_project WHERE id = #{sourceId}
SELECT is_enabled FROM fd_organization WHERE id = #{sourceId}
SELECT CODE FROM iam_menu_b WHERE CODE IN ( SELECT menu_code FROM iam_menu_permission WHERE permission_code = #{permissionCode} )
